EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to submitter when their Toolkit Application has been Accepted.
EmailTemplate.name: Toolkit Application Accepted
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit: Your Application Has Been Accepted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name};
Congratulations, your application to participate in the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit has been accepted. The company information you specified for publication is active in the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit.
Participants are encouraged to use the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit for marketing purposes. We ask that you provide updates to your profile annually when prompted, and please report commercial opportunities or inquiries generated from the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit in a timely manner. The more we know about how the {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit is working, the better we can assist you.
If you would like to report inquiries or successes, please log into your dashboard to update your profile (https://www.export.gov/dashboard).
Thank you. The {!Case.RecordType} Toolkit Team
